participant_1.background:
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently suffer from social anxiety.
I enjoy spending my weekends training with edged weapons and reading about mountaineering.
i am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents.
my hair is long and blonde.

participant_2.background:
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.
I'm retired and not very tall, but I'm content with my life.
i have 3 brothers.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

content.text: Hello there, I am doing well, how are you?
I am doing well, thank you. I am currently in my room, training with my edged weapons.
That is cool. I am retired and home relaxing. I just got back from London.
That sounds fun. I have never been to London.
It was fun. I am content with my life, even though I am not very tall and I have 3 brothers.
That's good. I am glad that you are happy. I am a 14 year old boy living with my mom and grandparents. I suffer from social anxiety.
I am sorry to hear that. I am glad that you have your family to support you.
Thank you. I am glad that you are enjoying your retirement.
Thank you. I am happy to chat with you.
Me too. I like making new friends.
Me too. I am always looking for new people to talk to.
